name: Run Knight
description:
It's an Amazing rpg game.
You will lose your way on the huge path.
Collect gold and capture the swords of the gods to defeat powerful monsters.
Don't forget to collect potions on the way. Or you might run into a big spider!

- 7 Unbeliavable Defeatable Monsters
- 7 Amazing Different Swords
- Infinite Run & 7 Difficulties
- Amazing Skillshots, Effects, Sounds, Enviroment!
